comment.body:
It should be the same issue discussed here (without solution)
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1548671064_1PpoRxgiiEd3xCZ4MDUxx3m87JbAPDCaHK
try to get freelance job, from uncles or friend's friends (you can first build up word of mouth by providing free helps to the community)
Don't give up, people comes and goes but the door is always opened for you
